original_text: The wild animal that I saw was like a leopard. But its feet were like a bear's feet and its mouth was like a lion's mouth. The dragon gave his own power and great authority to the wild animal so that it could rule as king.
korean_text: 내가 본 짐승은 표범과 비슷하고 그 발은 곰의 발 같고 그 입은 사자의 입 같은데 용이 자기의 능력과 보좌와 큰 권세를 그에게 주었더라

sentences.original_text: The wild animal that I saw was like a leopard.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 본 그 짐승은 표범과 같았습니다.

sentences.original_text: But its feet were like a bear's feet
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 발은 곰의 발과 같았고

sentences.original_text: and its mouth was like a lion's mouth.
The dragon gave his own power
and great authority to the wild animal
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 큰 권위를 그 짐승에게 주었습니다.

sentences.original_text: so that it could rule as king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 왕으로 다스릴 수 있도록 하기 위해서입니다.
